mapper.update: UPDATE production SET company_code = #{companyCode}, farm_code = #{farmCode}, expected_cage_production_code = #{expectedCageProductionCode}, real_harvest_day = #{realHarvestDay}, real_production = #{realProduction}, loss_rate = #{lossRate}, member_id = #{memberId}, production_reg_date = CURDATE() WHERE production_code = #{productionCode};
mapper.select: SELECT production_code as productionCode, company_code as companyCode, farm_code as farmCode, expected_cage_production_code as expectedCageProductionCode, real_harvest_day as realHarvestDay, real_production as realProduction, loss_rate as lossRate, member_id as memberId, production_reg_date as productionRegDate FROM production WHERE production_code = #{productionCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE farm_info SET farm_name = #{farmName}, company_code = #{companyCode}, farm_reg_date = CURDATE(), farm_detail = #{farmDetail}, member_id = #{memberId}, cage_amount = #{cageAmount}, total_capacity = #{totalCapacity}, farm_address = #{farmAddr} WHERE farm_code = #{farmCode};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO production ( production_code, company_code, farm_code, expected_cage_production_code, real_harvest_day, real_production, loss_rate, member_id, production_reg_date ) VALUES ( #{productionCode}, #{companyCode}, #{farmCode}, #{expectedCageProductionCode}, #{realHarvestDay}, #{realProduction}, #{lossRate}, #{memberId}, curdate() );
mapper.select: SELECT c.expected_cage_production_code AS cycleCode, c.company_code AS companyCode, c.farm_code AS farmCode, c.cage_code AS cageCode, c.harvest_start_date AS harvestStartDate, c.estimated_harvest_date AS estimatedHarvestDate, c.input_egg AS inputEgg, c.calculation_standard_code AS calculationStandardCode, c.estimated_production AS estimatedProduction, c.estimated_production_reg_date AS estimatedProductionRegDate FROM cage_cycle as c WHERE c.expected_cage_production_code = #{cycleCode}

SELECT c.expected_cage_production_code as cycleCode, c.farm_code as farmCode, c.calculation_standard_code as calculationStandardCode, c.estimated_production as estimatedProduction FROM cage_cycle as c LEFT JOIN production p ON c.expected_cage_production_code = p.expected_cage_production_code WHERE c.company_code = #{companyCode} AND p.expected_cage_production_code IS NULL;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cage_cycle ( expected_cage_production_code, company_code, farm_code, cage_code, harvest_start_date, estimated_harvest_date, input_egg, calculation_standard_code, estimated_production, member_id, estimated_production_reg_date ) VALUES ( #{cycleCode}, #{companyCode}, #{farmCode}, #{cageCode}, #{harvestStartDate}, #{estimatedHarvestDate}, #{inputEgg}, #{calculationStandardCode}, #{estimatedProduction}, #{memberId}, CURDATE() )

INSERT INTO cage ( cage_code, cage_name, company_code, farm_code, optimal_input_egg, member_id, cage_reg_date, cage_num, cage_volume, cage_volume_unit, cage_total ) VALUES ( #{cageCode}, #{cageName}, #{companyCode}, #{farmCode}, #{optimalInputEgg}, #{memberId}, CURDATE(), #{cageNum}, #{cageVolume}, 'L', #{cageTotal} )

INSERT INTO farm_info ( farm_code, farm_name, company_code, farm_reg_date, cage_amount, member_id, total_capacity, farm_address, farm_detail ) VALUES ( #{farmCode}, #{farmName}, #{companyCode}, CURDATE(), #{cageAmount}, #{memberId}, #{totalCapacity}, #{farmAddr}, #{farmDetail} )
mapper.select: SELECT cage_code AS cageCode, cage_name AS cageName, company_code AS companyCode, farm_code AS farmCode, optimal_input_egg AS optimalInputEgg, member_id AS memberId, cage_reg_date AS cageRegDate, cage_num AS cageNum, cage_volume AS cageVolume, cage_volume_unit AS cageVolumeUnit, cage_total AS cageTotal FROM cage WHERE cage_code = #{cageCode}

SELECT cage_code AS cageCode, cage_name AS cageName, company_code AS companyCode, farm_code AS farmCode, optimal_input_egg AS optimalInputEgg, member_id AS memberId, cage_reg_date AS cageRegDate, cage_num AS cageNum, cage_volume AS cageVolume, cage_volume_unit AS cageVolumeUnit, cage_total AS cageTotal FROM cage WHERE farm_code = #{farmCode}

SELECT cage_code AS cageCode, cage_name AS cageName, company_code AS companyCode, farm_code AS farmCode, optimal_input_egg AS optimalInputEgg, member_id AS memberId, DATE_FORMAT(cage_reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS cageRegDate, cage_num AS cageNum, cage_volume AS cageVolume, cage_volume_unit AS cageVolumeUnit, cage_total AS cageTotal FROM cage WHERE company_code = #{companyCode}
AND (${searchKey} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%'))

SELECT farm_code AS farmCode, farm_status_hum AS farmStatusHum, farm_status_illum AS farmStatusIllum, farm_status_temp AS farmStatusTemp, farm_status_reg_date AS farmStatusRegDate FROM farm_status_log WHERE farm_code = #{farmCode}

SELECT feeding_num AS feedingNum, company_code AS companyCode, farm_code AS farmCode, expected_cage_production_code AS expectedCageProductionCode, feeding_amount AS feedingAmount, feeding_date AS feedingDate, member_id AS memberId FROM feeding where expected_cage_production_code = #{cycleCode}

SELECT farm_code AS farmCode, farm_name AS farmName, farm_detail as farmDetail, company_code AS companyCode, farm_address AS farmAddr, farm_reg_date AS farmRegDate, cage_amount AS cageAmount, total_capacity AS totalCapacity, member_id AS memberId FROM farm_info WHERE company_code = #{companyCode} order by farm_name asc

SELECT farm_code AS farmCode, farm_name AS farmName, farm_detail as farmDetail, company_code AS companyCode, farm_address AS farmAddr, farm_reg_date AS farmRegDate, cage_amount AS cageAmount, total_capacity AS totalCapacity, member_id AS memberId FROM farm_info WHERE farm_code = #{farmCode}
